trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for implementing layout engines.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base para implementar mecanismos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe quando você deseja criar o comportamento de layout personalizado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Derive your own class from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout%2A> method to define your custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: Derive sua própria classe do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout%2A> método para definir o comportamento do seu layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> class to implement custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe para implementar o comportamento de layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Layout behavior should be the same for any instance of your layout engine's associated container class.
trans-unit.target: Comportamento de layout deve ser o mesmo para qualquer instância da classe de contêiner associado do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, consider declaring your layout engine's constructor <see langword="protected" /> or <see langword="private" />, and implementing your layout engine as a singleton class.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, considere a declaração de construtor do mecanismo de layout <see langword="protected" /> ou <see langword="private" />e a implementação de seu mecanismo de layout, como uma classe singleton.

trans-unit.source: The container on which the layout engine will operate.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner no qual o mecanismo de layout operará.

trans-unit.source: The bounds defining the container's size and position.
trans-unit.target: Os limites que definem o tamanho e a posição do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: Optionally provide initialization logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.InitLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, fornecer lógica de inicialização no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.InitLayout%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="child" /> is not a type on which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> can perform layout.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="child" /> não é um tipo no qual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> pode executar o layout.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.InitLayout(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> method to provide your custom initialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.InitLayout(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> método para fornecer o comportamento de inicialização personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The container on which the layout engine will operate.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner no qual o mecanismo de layout operará.

trans-unit.source: An event argument from a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento do evento de um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the layout engine perform a layout operation.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que o mecanismo de layout execute uma operação de layout.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if layout should be performed again by the parent of <paramref name="container" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> caso o layout deva ser executado novamente pelo pai de <paramref name="container" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the layout engine is to perform a layout operation on the `container` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando o mecanismo de layout está executar uma operação de layout na `container` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: You can check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedComponent%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> properties on `layoutEventArgs` to decide if a layout operation is necessary.
trans-unit.target: Você pode verificar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedComponent%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> propriedades `layoutEventArgs` para decidir se uma operação de layout é necessária.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout%2A> method to implement custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout%2A> método para implementar o comportamento de layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="container" /> is not a type on which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> can perform layout.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="container" /> não é um tipo no qual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> pode executar o layout.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method to provide your custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método para fornecer o comportamento do seu layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: When laying out the contents of the <paramref name="container" /> parameter, be sure to check the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property of each child control.
trans-unit.target: Ao dispor o conteúdo do <paramref name="container" /> parâmetro, verifique o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> propriedade de cada controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Return <see langword="true" /> if your layout engine logic determines that layout should be performed again by the parent of the container.
trans-unit.target: Retornar <see langword="true" /> se sua lógica de mecanismo de layout determina que o layout deve ser executado novamente pelo pai do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This might occur, for example, when the layout engine resizes child controls and determines that the container must be increased in size to accommodate the new layout.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ocorrer, por exemplo, quando o mecanismo de layout é redimensionado controles filho e determina que o contêiner deve ser aumentado para acomodar o novo layout.
